title: Understanding Data Inventory
text: When considering data inventory, it's crucial to ask questions that help you understand the data's origin, growth, and sensitivity.

title: Reverse Engineering Data Sources
text: Consider whether you can trace back the data to its sources and identify which teams contribute to its growth.

title: Growth in Customer Base vs. Data
text: Evaluate how the increase in customers and revenue aligns with the expansion of data.

title: Sensitive Data Growth
text: Assess the rate at which sensitive data is increasing compared to overall data growth.

title: Comprehensive Understanding
text: To fully grasp data inventory, consider all aspects: data source tracing, customer growth correlation, and sensitive data expansion.
choices: Are you able to reverse engineer the data sources and understand which teams are responsible for the growth in data size and risk
As the company grows, how does the growth in the customer base and revenue correspond to the growth in data
How fast is sensitive data growing relative to data overall
